description: Canvas is a widget that can be used to draw graphics using a [canvas context](./CanvasContext.md).

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

parameters.name: contextType
parameters.description: The context identifier. Only `"2d"` is supported.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: the width of the canvas context to create

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: the height of the canvas context to create

getContext.description: Returns the drawing context with the given size.
